markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs=""
>
[Winter's Kiss](/Feats.aspx?ID=4102) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 185 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Gelid Shard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=201)

</column>

---

Whether in the heart of a volcanic passageway or the glacial tundras of the Crown of the World, the only temperature you ever personally experience is an oddly comfortable chill. You are now protected from [extreme cold and extreme heat](/Rules.aspx?ID=642), and you gain resistance to fire equal to half your level. If you would already have resistance to fire equal to half your level from a heritage, ancestry feat, class feat, or another archetype feat, you instead gain resistance to fire equal to your level.
name: Winter's Kiss
